casebody.data:
DISCIPLINARY DOCKET

91-1705. Columbus Bar Assn. v. Nichols.

On response to show cause order. Respondent Leroy Alvin Nichols is permitted to make monthly payments spread equally over the period of his probation.

Moyer, C.J., and Resnick, J., dissent and would find respondent in contempt and place the order in his file. Wright, J., not participating.
